content:
Classify the intent of the following message received by a pharmacy. Extract entities as described in the json schema provided. Your output should be a YAML that contains the applicable intent(s) and entity(s). Do not include anything else. 

----
Hi I'm trying to do voice to text and it keeps getting away from me period oh no that's not what I meant oh well ok my grandson said I should call you because he saw me take my acetomenaphin which I do usually take every day you see when you get to my age theres a lot of aches and pains and it really does help with my arthritis but he's taking some science class, he goes to rice you know very impressive we're all very proud of him oh well anyway he was concerned I was taking it so much but I told him not to worry. Now he's seen the blood thinner in my bathroom and insisted I couldn't take my painkiller anymore. I think it's a whole lot of fuss but he insisted we ask so please tell me if it's ok. I really don't see the issue and I'll take any relief I can get at this point ha.

chosen:
---
-   intent: OFU284
    entities:
        pills: acetomenaphin, blood thinner
rejected:
---
intent: Check insurance coverage
entities:
    medicine: acetomenaphin
    insurer: Rice University
